00038 NxVec3 Wander::Execute(AgentInfoPtr aInfo)
00039 {
00040         // find a random direction
00041         float r1 = (float)rand() - (float)RAND_MAX/2.0f;
00042         float r2 = (float)rand() - (float)RAND_MAX/2.0f;
00043         float r3 = (float)rand() - (float)RAND_MAX/2.0f;
00044         NxVec3 randomDir(r1, r2, r3);
00045         randomDir.normalize();
00046         // scale it with a noise factor
00047         randomDir =  randomDir * m_fcKNoise;
00048         // change the current velocity to point to a random direction
00049         m_vWander = m_vWander + randomDir;
00050         aInfo->m_vOrientation = m_vWander;
00051         aInfo->m_vOrientation.normalize();
00052         // scale the new velocity
00053         m_vWander = aInfo->m_vOrientation * m_fcKWander;
00054         aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vOrientation * aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity / 2.0f + m_vWander;
00055         
00056         if (aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity.magnitude() > aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity)
00057                 aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity = aInfo->m_vOrientation * aInfo->m_fcMaxVelocity;
00058         
00059 
00060         return aInfo->m_vDesiredVelocity;
00061         
00062 }
